excerpt.rendered:
Locally screen printed in Portland, Oregon by Icon Artistry!
Artwork by Sage’s Strange World 🤡

These long sleeve shirts feature a 5 color screen print, and fun arm details! 🎪

Fruit of the Loom, preshrunk 100% cotton long sleeve tee- unisex

Because of how limited edition these are, sizes cannot be refunded/swapped.

❇ ✿ ❇ ✿ ❇ ✿ ❇ ✿

We have very limited stock on these, get them while they’re here!
